item.title: mysql
item.description: this is my mysql # import java.sql.*; public class DBUtil { public String username = "root"; public String password = "123456"; private String url="jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/mysql"; /** * 1. 实现数据库连接的方法 */ public Connection getConn() { Connection conn = null; try { Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"); conn = DriverManager.getConnection(url, username, password); System.out.println("连接数据库成功."); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } return conn; } /** * 2. 释放数据库连接 */ public void closeConn(ResultSet rs, PreparedStatement pstm, Connection conn) throws Exception { if (rs !
